summary.span: 使用固定配置向服务主机添加工作流控制终结点的行为。

span.span: A behavior that adds a workflow control endpoint with a fixed configuration to the service host.

summary.span: 固定工作流控制相对终结点地址。

span.span: The fixed workflow control relative endpoint address.

summary.span: 此地址将附加到服务的基址以创建控制终结点地址。

span.span: This address is appended to the base address of the service to create the control endpoint address.

summary.span: 获取使用 HTTP 协议时工作流实例控制终结点的绑定。

span.span: Gets the binding for the workflow instance control endpoint when the HTTP protocol is used.

value.span: 工作流实例控制终结点的绑定。

span.span: The binding for the workflow instance control endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将基于为服务主机的基址配置的协议自动创建绑定。The binding is automatically created based on the protocols configured for the service host's base address. 发送到工作流实例控制终结点的消息不包含任何个人身份信息，因此无需对其进行加密。Messages sent to the workflow instance control endpoint do not contain any personally identifiable information and therefore it need not be encrypted. 发送到工作流控制终结点的消息需要包含用于身份验证的用户标识。Messages sent to the workflow control endpoint need to contain the user identity to use for authorization. HTTP 协议启用时，会使用具有以下设置的 。When the HTTP protocol is enabled, the is used with the following settings. 1. 事务流已启用。Transaction flow is enabled. 2. 安全模式设置为 。Security mode is set to . 3. 使用 Windows 客户端凭据。Windows client credentials are used.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding NamedPipeControlEndpointBinding { get; }

summary.span: 获取使用 net.pipe 协议时工作流实例控制终结点的绑定。

span.span: Gets the binding for the workflow instance control endpoint when the net.pipe protocol is used.

value.span: 工作流实例控制终结点的绑定。

span.span: The binding for the workflow instance control endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将基于为服务主机的基址配置的协议自动创建绑定。The binding is automatically created based on the protocols configured for the service host's base address. 发送到工作流实例控制终结点的消息不包含任何个人身份信息，因此无需对其进行加密。Messages sent to the workflow instance control endpoint do not contain any personally identifiable information and therefore it need not be encrypted. 发送到工作流控制终结点的消息需要包含用于身份验证的用户标识。Messages sent to the workflow control endpoint need to contain the user identity to use for authorization. net.pipe 协议启用时，会使用具有以下设置的 。When the net.pipe protocol is enabled, the is used with the following settings. 1. 事务流已启用。Transaction flow is enabled. 2. 安全模式设置为 。Security mode is set to . 3. 传输安全级别设置为 。Transport security level is set to . 4. 使用 Windows 客户端凭据。Windows client credentials are used.

summary.span: 获取或设置有权使用工作流实例控制终结点的 Windows 用户组。

span.span: Gets or sets the Windows group of users authorized to use the workflow instance control endpoint.

value.span: 有权使用工作流实例控制终结点的 Windows 用户组。

span.span: The Windows group of users authorized to use the workflow instance control endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 "BUILTIN\Administrators"。Defaults to "BUILTIN\Administrators". 有效设置为：本地 Windows 组或 Windows 域。Valid settings are: a local Windows group or a Windows domain.
